name: places/ChIJueRhimn2wokRS8bhsyQfvA8
adrFormatAddress: 3200 Broadway, New York, NY 10027, USA

originalText.text:
Manager asked one of my employees to endorse a commercial check, I spoke to her regarding the issue and tried to explain to her that the check is being deposited in a business account and that nobody other than me can endorse the check. Without hesitations she insisted that the check needed to be endorsed to be deposited, which is illegal!!!
Please do your research before advising.

originalText.text: Ms. Woods provided exceptional customer service to make sure my inquiry was attended and resolved in a timely manner. Thank you!

text.text: Ms. Woods provided exceptional customer service to make sure my inquiry was attended and resolved in a timely manner. Thank you!

originalText.text: They need to just get rid of this bank. It was 2 people in there. The black lady looked at me when I came in and put her head down. So I said "hello". THENNNN... she greeted me. Smh she has her manners all wrong. So I tried to cash a check and all they could say was contact the person who gave it to you. They were literally no help at all. I call the person said it's no problem on their end. I had to go alllll the way to another Chase bank where I cashed my check without any problems. And they all greeted me nicely when I went in.

originalText.text: Had banking issues with Chase that could not be addressed by phone after 90 minutes being switched from agent to agent. Had to go into this local branch and Christina and her team were very helpful and patient while they were on the phone with the banks representatives, almost a full hour. The issue was resolved.

originalText.text: Jacqueline Wilson. I went in with a problem and left out with a smile on my face. Dealing with Jacqueline Wilson was probably the best customer service experience that I've ever had. She was extremely patient and polite. Thank you Ms. Wilson.
